00044 #include "nut_io.h"
00045 
00046 #include <io.h>
00047 #include <string.h>
00048 
00049 #include <sys/heap.h>
00050 
00055 
00073 int vfscanf_P(FILE * stream, PGM_P fmt, va_list ap)
00074 {
00075     int rc;
00076     char *rp;
00077     size_t rl;
00078 
00079     rl = strlen_P(fmt) + 1;
00080     if ((rp = NutHeapAlloc(rl)) == 0)
00081         return -1;
00082     memcpy_P(rp, fmt, rl);
00083     rc = _getf(_read, _fileno(stream), rp, ap);
00084     NutHeapFree(rp);
00085 
00086     return rc;
00087 }
